title: "Unfix" Print preView
content: How do I get back to traditional print preview? We had this problem before, and I set print.tab_modal.enabled to False. That worked for a while, but someone has decided to play Big Brother and ignore that setting. It's really annoying to have to change it for each print. And the preView under modal is frequently too small to be useful.

title: mentett jelszavak
content: Szép estét! valamiért elindult a hibaelhárítási mód és az összes mentett jelszavam eltűnt, hogyan tudom vissza állítani ? esetleg a régi Firefox könyvárból amit elmentett,csak melyik fájl az ezt nem tudom, a mentett jelszavak vissza állítása fájlból pedig az írja hogy nincs engedélyezve. A segítségüket előre is köszönöm Tisztelettel :Zsapka József
creator: sweggert77

title: PDF Text Clipping
content:
I have two PDFs that I designed and uploaded to our website, but the headline in both displays with clipped characters in Firefox. Different fonts were used in both and the issue is the same. I even tried adding more tracking then re-uploading, the issue persists.

I checked in other browsers and the text displays as intended. The attached screenshots show the issue in Firefox, compared to how it should look (viewed in Chrome).

It's only this one line of text that is affected and I don't know why.
creator: bg-design

title: [2022] Browser hard refreshes don't seem to be working anymore (Ctrl + F5, or Ctrl + Shift + R).
content:
Before if I wanted to refresh a page, I could click the refresh button or right click on the tab or page and select refresh.

And if I wanted to refresh the page but also delete the back history (AKA hard refresh), I would use a shortcut command like Ctrl + F5 or Ctrl + Shift + R. I had actually created a new shortcut Alt + ` to do that. And it used to work. It would delete my back history.

But for a while now, it hasn't worked. The hard refresh just acts like a regular refresh.

creator: will.smith425

title: Firefox forgets default application to open files
content:
For a few days now (maybe since the last update to 97.0.1?), Firefox keeps forgetting the setting how to open .jnlp files. This suddenly happened on all of our machines. The file type was set to be sent to an application, this has always worked fine and we did not change or update anything else, the setting always resets to "always ask" when clicking a .jnlp link.

When I set the action back to open the file with the correct application, that setting gets correctly saved and is also still in place when restarting Firefox. When I open a .jnlp link, instead of sending the file to the application, Firefox asks me if I want to save that file. When I select "cancel", the setting still is correct. But when I select "save file", the setting gets reset to "always ask".
creator: Kezo

title: Mozilla Maintenance Service is not updating Firefox
content:
Hey! We want to use Firefox in our school. The school computers are running Windows 10 in a domain. The normal users don´t have rights to install software / updates. That's why we want to use the Mozilla Maintenance Service but it doesn´t work as expected.

After installing a clean Firefox (no old profiles, data, or anything else) it shows that there is a new version. When you click on that message you have to get through Windows UAC. With the admin it is just a "yes"-click but everyone else needs a password.

Any ideas what i can check or try to get the Mozilla Maintenance Service updating Firefox?

Thanks a lot! Nils
creator: nilskammerer

title: How to stop automatically loading the homepage on startup and load the firefox default homepage instead but retain the custom homepage on home button?
content:
Hi, I'm using Mozilla Firefox browser version 97.0.1 (64 bit) on a windows 8 Home 64 bit Pc. I have poemhunter.com setup as my homepage. However, when I start the browser, it automatically loads poemhunter.com. I want the browser to not load poemhunter.com at startup but go to the default Firefox home. I would like to go to poemhunter.com only when i click on the home button. In my previous Brave browser this wasn't a problem at all.

I have tried to change the values of browser.startup.page from about:config but it didn't do the trick. For Now i have boomarked poemhunter.com and have set default firefox home as my homepage. However i would like my homebutton to lead me to poemhunter.com but only when i click on it. Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated.
creator: mujawids

title: Secure Connection Failed every 8 or 10 minutes
content: It's been around 2 months when I saw this error and since then it's been pathetic using Firefox. Every 8 or 10 minutes, only the google sites ( like google search engine, gmail, scholar etc.) do not respond and reloading the page pops-up "Secure connection failed". This does not end until I restart the browser. Don't see a way to fix this :/
creator: skuk.6747

title: Session Restore doesn't work anymore in FF 97.0.1 (64Bit Win10)
content:
After updating to FF97.0.1 (64Bit) under Windows 10 (German) the Session Restore isn't anymore working. Setting in the FF-Control isn't changed and correct to restore previous open windows and tabs, but it isn't doing anything - no PopUp for restoring and no restore at all.

The menu in browsing history for restoring the previous session isn't available anymore. Fortunately the startupCache directory is still available will all the necessary files. How can I force FF to load the startupCache 'startupCache.8.little?

Thanks in advance for your support!

Rolf
creator: r.wichter

title: Перестали отображаться некоторые сайты.
content: Перестали отображаться сайты. Скриншоты прилагаются. Браузер выдал ошибку и самостоятельно закрылся. После перезапуска было написано что я использую последнюю версяю сайта (возможно так он обновился, что тоже было бы странно, т.к. это произошло во время работы без предупреждения). Все вкладки закрылись, однако было предложено их восстановить, что и было сделано. После восстановления вкладок на некоторых сайтах перестали отображаться либо часть либо страницы полностью (во вложении вк и код бейсикс) Ни перезагрузка компьютера, ни чистка куков и кэша не помогли. Почините пожалуйста браузе, а то частью программ уже начал пользоваться в хром. Переезжать не хочется, но возможно будет вынужденная мера =(

title: Felhasználói fiók mentett adatok
content:
Üdv

Olyan problémám lenne a regisztrált profilommal, hogy kb 1 hete eladtam a laptopomat, amin használtam a profilt. Eladás előtt kiléptem a profilomból és feltett egy kérdést a böngésző, hogy akarom-e törölni az adataim a gépről. Erre igent nyomtam, de ahogy bejelentkeztem az új gépen, azt tapasztaltam hogy a korábban mentett adataim, belépési jelszavaim eltűntek a profilomból. Sok olyan fontos adatom volt benne, amit nem tudok jelszó emlékeztetővel helyreállítani, mert mint kiderült ezeket az oldalakat már 15 éve használtam/regisztráltam, ami még egy mára már inaktív freemail-es email címre küldené a linket. Önöknek nincs egy biztonsági mentés a profilhoz, lehetséges visszaállítást csinálni?

Köszönöm

Válaszukat az ombika1@gmail.com címen tudom fogadni.
creator: ombika1

title: How to change the Tab color for inactive tabs?
content:
How to change the Tab color for inactive tabs?

I have a userChrome file and have been able to change the color of the active tab but cannot do so for the inactive tab. The inactive tab color blends into the toolbar color. If I move my mouse cursor over it changes to a slight darker gray color.

Active tab color. I made mine a off white color:

.tab-background[selected="true"] { 

   background-color: #f9f7f1 !important;

}

Hi there. So I haven't been using Mozilla Firefox for very long and I created my account just a few weeks ago. Since then I have bought myself a new PC and when I try to login into my primary account it gives me the message: "Primary account email required for sign-in" even though I only have one e-mail (and I had to create a new one just to post here) and even if I go into 'Manage accounts' to add my primary e-mail which doesn't work for whatever reason, it says this: "This email was already verified by another user" and the only one that has verified it is me... I'm very frustrated about this and I have been trying to fix this problem for an entire day now.

I need help fixing this because I don't want to lose all my bookmarked websites!

And here is a thing: this exception (for vk.com) allows to bypass 3rd party cookie blocking (on metro-cc.ru, pic. 4), if certain exception appears as 3rd party (vk.com). Is it bug or feature?

title: Cannot open FF, no matter what I do.
content:
FF 97.0. Win10

Thought I may have installed a virus. Just updated FF today and saw that there are some issues similar but not close.

It didn't happen immediately, but slow-rolled in. No popups and no diverting pages, etc., so I really don't know what the issue is. Virus seems likely.

Ran 2 AV products. Nine PUPS detected by MBAM. All installed by PC Cleaner. Installed a second AV and I got 560 hits - all seemingly cookies placed by PC Cleaner and 1 adware tracker by same.

I cannot open FF. I am having a problem with Edge. Only IE seems to be working. Massive downtime with *Edge not responding* and identically with other Outlook based programs (OL.com and Office Outlook.) Every time I try to open FF, the box pops up telling me FF crashed. Sent reports, which I cannot open. Of course, I uninstalled and reinstalled FF, but still...

I should be able to report the link, but unsure where to go. In unfamiliar territory on a different browser that I hate and without the settings (and addons) that I love. Keyboard now acting strangely, but it is fairly beat up.

PILE ON ME today!

Suggestions welcome.

Thank you.
creator: CiaoBella1

title: Why does this say "Banking $" in the address bar?
content:
This is a new installation of Firefox on a Windows 11 machine. I've not seen this on my Windows 10 machine, On the right side of the address bar in green it says 'banking $' this is on Youtube. I visited a bank site and this did not appear. It also has a thin green line above the tab.

What is this? What is it's purpose? And how do I get rid of it?

Thank you
creator: falselogic

title: CIBC online banking, Uniqlo sites won't load on Firefox
content:
CIBC online banking doesn't load on Firefox. Works fine in Chrome. Uniqlo's Canadian site won't load on Firefox. Works fine in Chrome. Many sites either don't load or are super slow and buggy (like Facebook half the time) when using Firefox. Banking sites don't work well with Firefox, but are fine with Chrome.

I am getting kind of tired having to use 2 browsers. Firefox used to be my go-to but a couple years ago, everything I needed to use (online banking, shipping, e-commerce stuff) either wouldn't load or would take so long, I just started using Chrome.

Are these issues ever going to get resolved, or do I have to continually delete cookies and history (huge PITA) only for Firefox to continue not to work like it used to. I think it's time to break up for good.
creator: anitaleisser
